website_summaries.verdict: The low-top Saucony Stretch & Go Breeze is designed for the modern active lifestyle. Its engineered mesh uppers with synthetic overlays deliver the essential comfort and lightweight feel that many customers love.The slip-on construction has been beneficial to a large percentage of its wearers, including some who have movement issues. Design-wise, the sneaker's modest color schemes make it easy to pair with a multitude of outfits. With its $70 regular price, many found that it is worth every penny.
pros: A significant number of its wearers state that it feels comfortable
The majority of the shoppers are delighted because of the easy slip-on/off aspect of the Saucony Stretch & Go Breeze
The cushioning of the low-top has been praised by a decent quantity of buyers
A customer finds no issues with the shoe as his mom who has Alzheimer's uses it regularly
Some of the mothers who bought a pair are very stoked with the low-top that they also ordered another pair for their daughters
A few of the reviewers have commended the Stretch & Go Breeze's stylish design
A decent number of purchasers advised that the sneaker looks great with pants, jeans, leggings, and even dresses
The memory foam insole has been top-notch, according to some wearers
According to a reviewer, the toe box has sufficient wiggle room
Its price is one of the many attributes that make this low-top worth considering, as per a couple of consumers
cons: Some have warned that the Stretch & Go shoe from Saucony lacks the support that they expected
There is a customer who is disappointed because the stability that this sneaker gives is less than stellar

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Received them and was able to put them on with few problems. Beware, they do have a narrow opening that you would normally be able to fix with loosening laces, which is not an option here. It's the reason I ordered a size larger than I usually wear and it turned out to be the right call. Be sure your socks are loose around the toes because they will stretch tight when you pull the shoes on. Any old timers like me will know the significance of that statement. I'll try to post an update after I've worn them a while.
customer_reviews.author: Smartyboots

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Not supportive at all. The shoe is a soft thick sock kind of material which could be comfy for someone with swelling or something but otherwise it just allows your foot to move all over in the shoe. Also felt like I was standing on a flat pillow...not supportive at all. I knew the second I put them on my feet I didn’t like them and then dropped them off at ups the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT (almost).
customer_reviews.text: These may be the most comfortable shoes (almost) that I have ever purchased. I love how easy they are to slip on and off, and they do feel like you are walking on pillows. However, "pillows" have drawbacks. For my feet, these don't quite have enough firmness in the sole for long walks on hard surfaces (tiled or cement floors in airports, shopping malls, etc.). Still, definitely a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Hombre

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable, easy to slip on and go, and attractive! I’m always a size 9, ordered a 9, and it was a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Inga M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, I would probably like it just a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I would probably like it just a little tighter in the fit--it is a pull-on; otherwise I like the shoe a lot, very cushiony which is what I wanted. We'll see how it wears.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description but the product is great
customer_reviews.text: The saucony description was navy red, however the picture and product received is black white. This is of no bother to me. These shoes are Uber comfortable. Soooooo comfy for a walk around the neighborhood or a trip to do some errands. They are slip ons so I wouldn’t wear to run a marathon but are perfect for everyday use. Breathable, lightweight, perfect 10 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Mama

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these shoes I have bought my daughter. She loves them. She is a physical therapist on her feet all day and loves the comfort and support these give her. She likes the fact that they are slip on so you don't have to worry about them being too tight or too loose because no ties. She does not use them for running so can't comment on that but she highly recommends these for anyone on their feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for kicking around the house and running errands, and they fulfill those functions perfectly. They have too little side support for serious running, and my foot slides around just enough to create blisters when I try running. These are fun shoes, not serious shoes, and that's exactly what I was looking for. Did have to upsize a full size.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great traveling shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are PERFECT. I got them in the red color and they were a little darker than the online picture, but I liked that. They are also SOOOO comfortable and literally the most perfect airport shoe. Easy to get on and off, and good for long days of walking . Fit exactly as I expected . They are my new traveling go-to shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli K Russell

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Comfortable and easy to wear without laces. Walked all over Disney parks for 4 straight days. They do run a size big. I wear an 8 usually and I had to get a 9. I ordered them in 3 colors!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. She had bought a pair of these from a local shoe store and loves them. This second pair will be her "clean" pair as the others being her favorite comfort shoe are looking a little worn.
customer_reviews.author: Pete L

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and comfortable. Took them out for a walk and they felt nice. The real test will be a 10 hour shift of climbing a ladder and walking, but they seem promising.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Run small, tall flap
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love the fit of these because they’re so cute, especially in person. However, fit runs at least half a size small, maybe a full size. Saucony 12 always fits me but these do not. The width tightness would probably stretch out, but they’re also too short. The tongue/flap sticks up past my short socks, which would really bother me and probably create a blister
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a ton of support but cute
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on in a sneaker store and they seem to have a lot more bounce and Christian to them when their rideshare they don't seem very Christian at all. And I figure the bike good for travel so you have to untie shoes.
customer_reviews.author: bawstongirl

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy - Good workout shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy yet stylish shoe. I bought a black pair a month ago at one of my local retailers because I love the fit!
customer_reviews.author: Philly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes in the insole but a lil bit stretchy when you wear them. I understand that these shoes are supposed to be laceless but they come a lil bit stretch. Overall they are recommended.
customer_reviews.author: anderson caviedes

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect! I have an older pair of cohesion 3 and the sizes are both the same. I love how much room there is (my foot is a little on the wider side). The are very breathable too. Perfect walking or being on your feet all day!
customer_reviews.author: ssr

customer_reviews.title: Best slip on sneaker ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair and I love the color! Very comfortable and great all around comfort shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: better than the $100+ athletic shoes (Brooks, Asics, etc)
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were the answer to my foot problem. I have been dealing with a partially torn achiiles tendon and I haven't been able to stand wearing any shoe that touches the area around my achiiles....until I tried these shoes on in black/white at a retail store and found them to be very comfortable. so when i saw these on sale (paid half the price on Amazon) and in a different color, I ordered them immediately. I would definitely recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Slip ons
customer_reviews.text: They are fine I didn’t pay close enough attention and didn’t notice they were slip ins before I bought and they are a little loose around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I find these super comfortable, for daily running around and power walks. This is my third pair because they were on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Josselyn

customer_reviews.title: Not Womens! These are men’s
customer_reviews.text: These are listed as Womens but they are not... These are men shoes
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish shoes at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe color is accurately shown. My foot slipped into the shoe easily and once on, the "grip" of the elasticized upper kept my foot from slipping out. They are very comfortable shoes (I have wide feet), I wore them for most of the day. Great price, arrived on time in a plastic bag that doubled as the return bag which I did not need to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M. Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and work great for running, walking or casual wear! I had compliments everywhere I go!
customer_reviews.author: MommaSanford

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking! Upper fabric a little loose for my foot...
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable! However, the upper material is quite loose on my foot, I expected a little bit more snug sock-like fit but they’re a bit loose and wider than I thought, still comfortable though. It’s a shoe I am not going to be wearing all day... I will be buying another pair! 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Fav shoes
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and slip and go. The liners are the only thing that wear quickly...only complaint still love the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for travel, they are very light weight, easy on and off for airport security, and very comfortable for trekking around Disney for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and the color but they are not very comfortable. Zero support and poor cushioning. They also started rubbing on the back of my heels, which would probably stop after they’re broken in but still
customer_reviews.author: Annie Taliaferro

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: They are lite, comfortable, conform to my feet and are true to size. If they were cheaper than $70 bucks, I’d have them in every color. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... 8 months pregnant and needed a shoe I could easily slip on
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes 8 months pregnant and needed a shoe I could easily slip on. These fit the bill! I normally wear Saucony shoes for all my runs and these fit great. Have to buy 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Goff

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite walking shoe. They are comfortable and stylish, my friends saw them and now we all have bought these Saucony shoes. I workout in them and can also wear them with jeans or shorts. Highly recommend the Stretch N Go Breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my mom with Alzheimer’s. No laces to keep tied!
customer_reviews.author: janet k

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, functional and looks nice on, true to size
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, brightly colored burgundy shoes. Nice shoe for average feet. Not bulky at all
customer_reviews.author: S. Downey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great. Very comfortable. Easy on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but run a whole foot size too small
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lowe

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: They feel great but the heel insert to keep it upright digs in so I got blisters
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite tennis shoes! Got the black ones first and then the gray. Also bought a pair for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Like the fit real well. Very comfy, don’t have shoe strings, so just skip on. Don’t have to wear socks either, very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m in looooove!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my sweet lord. These shoes are an absolute delight! They are so comfortable and soft, and look great with my casual wear. I had so many compliments each day I’ve worn them.
customer_reviews.author: modijo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Memory foam comfort is great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Memory foam comfort is great. Bought a 2nd pair in a different color. Love them. They will be my go to wear everywhere shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loose fit
customer_reviews.text: Very loose because it has no show ties. Also, not a lot of support. Once I added insoles from Foot Locker they fit much better.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Tried to return them but guess i missed the deadline. Beware of sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are super light and comfortable especially with the memory foam cushion inside, plus they are slip ons!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pull on comfort
customer_reviews.text: The pull on sneakers are perfect for my lunch break walks at the office. Comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen F.

customer_reviews.title: going to order again
customer_reviews.text: omg I love these sneakers they fit like a glove and so comfortable and the price was just right
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lind

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I’ve ever worn. Love that I don’t have to tie laces.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a 7 or 7.5 shoe. I bought a 7.5 and 8. The 8 fit me perfectly! The 7.5 was too narrow in the toe and the Saucony logo on the top of the shoe rubbed against the top of my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The loop on the tongue was ripped. The shoes fit great. I just want to exchange them for ones that aren't damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Zweifel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, but I'm in between sizes so I had to return since they are slip on.
customer_reviews.author: AUDRA Robertson

product_meta.title: Saucony Men's Women's Stretch N Go Breeze Running Shoe
product_meta.description: No laces, no problems. The brand new Stretch & Go Smooth pairs performance materials with a modern fashion silhouette. No laces, but an elastic gore strap hugs the foot perfectly for easy on/easy off versatility. The Form2U sock liner makes this a shoe you can wear all day.
